definitions.explanation_en: A surname-derived adjective referring to someone or something associated with the family name MacLean, commonly found in Scottish and Irish contexts.
definitions.explanation_cn: 源自姓氏 MacLean 的形容词，用于指与苏格兰或爱尔兰姓氏 MacLean 相关的人或事物。
definitions.example_en: MacLean Castle is a historic landmark on the Isle of Mull.
definitions.example_cn: 麦克莱恩城堡是穆尔岛上的一处历史地标。
